text: Sky Sports was a South Korea broadcast channel using the operator Skylife TV. August 1, 2014 in Channel THE M was changed to Sky Sports. ==Channel number== TV Channel 1.IPTV olleh tv(KT) 54 B tv(SKB) 125 U+ tv(LG) 111 2.SATELLITE TV skylife 202 3.CABLE TV LG HELLO VISION 187 DLIVE 119 t-broad 124 CMB 83 HYUNDAI HCN 511 ==References== ==External links== *Official website *Facebook Page *Tv Schedule Category:2014 establishments in South Korea Category:Sports television networks in South Korea Category:Television channels and stations established in 2014 Category:Television channels in South Korea
title: Sky Sports (South Korean TV channel)
